Question
========

A researcher wants to know what percent of elementary school children have ever smoked. He draws a random sample of 240 children. It turns out that in the sample 30 children have ever smoked. What is the 95% confidence interval for the population parameter? 
Answerlist
----------
* 0.083 < $\pi$ < 0.167
* 0.124 < $\pi$ < 0.126
* 0.458 < $\pi$ < 0.542
* 0.104 < $\pi$ < 0.146

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
